about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of PRIM.

Creepy-but-cute tunes, straight from the Realm of the Dead. Income from this release will go to all musicians involved.

Music: Susanne Hardt, Bryan Atkinson

Album art: Steffi Kick

  • Track 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 15, 17 and 18 composed and arranged by Susanne Hardt, 2022-2024.

  • Track 1, 2, 3, 5, 14 and 16 composed and arranged by Bryan Atkinson, 2018-2024

  • Track 4 and 13 performed by the German Film Orchestra Babelsberg

Running time: 49:47

To access the soundtrack from Steam, select the game in your library. On the right, above the achievements, you can see the soundtrack listed as "additional content".

The soundtrack comes as 192 kbps mp3 and in addition FLAC if you activated "high quality audio" in your download settings.
